comment.author: 50578272@N07
comment._content: Es un valioso y gran testimonio de la Segunda Guerra Mundial y de la hambruna que sufría la gente en ese entonces. Aunque ésto pasó hace años, a mí me produce muchísima tristeza ver estas imágenes.

comment.author: 98338006@N00
comment._content: (the western part of the netherlands, where the big cities are, were worse off in the last winter of WW2 then the rest of the country. People travelled (on foot, sometimes by bike if not yet confiscated) ever bigger distances to buy food from farmers, or exchanging personal belongings for food. Deathtoll from just starving was very high)
